Register as Professional Visitor

Dear visitor,

We kindly request that you carefully fill out the registration form for each participant. Please note that the information you provide in the form (full name, job title, company name, etc.) will be displayed on your badge. After successful registration, a personalized electronic ticket will be sent to the email address you have provided. Upon arrival at the exhibition, please present the ticket on your mobile device or in printed form at the registration desk in order to receive your personalized badge.

Fields marked with * are required

Caspian Event Organisers LLC

AZERUENG

About

Caspian Event Organisers LLC offers wide range of services for congresses, conferences and meetings including planning, project organisation and on-site management. In addition, our company is providing services in organisation of participation at exhibitions, running advertising campaigns, accommodation services, organising official ceremonies
